mapper.select: select V3.*, comments_cnt from (select * from (select ROWNUM rnum, V.* from ( select ROWNUM row_number, id, member_id, title, write_date, plan_date, read, NAME member_name, FILE_ID member_profile FROM ( select BOARD.id, BOARD.member_id, title, write_date, plan_date, M.NAME, M.FILE_ID, NVL2(CB.MEMBER_ID, 'Y', 'N') read from BOARD LEFT OUTER JOIN CHECKED_BOARD CB on ID = CB.BOARD_ID and CB.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} INNER JOIN MEMBER M on M.ID = BOARD.MEMBER_ID where CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId} and WORK_SPACE_ID = #{workSpaceId} order by ID desc ) B order by read, row_number ) V ) V2 where rnum between #{paging.startNo} and #{paging.endNo} order by rnum) V3 left outer join ( select BOARD_ID, count(*) over (partition by BOARD_ID) comments_cnt from COMMENTS ) CM on CM.BOARD_ID = V3.ID
